titleStmt.title: To the Honourable, the knights, citizens, and burgesses, in Parliament assembled proposals humbly offered, for passing an act to prevent clipping and counterfeiting of mony [sic].
titleStmt.author: Chaloner, William.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Signed: From Eagle-street in Red-Lyon Fields, Feb. 11th, 1694. William Chaloner.
Reproduction of original in Columbia University.
